1.name: Sherlock Jr.
1.description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

2.name: Greed
2.description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

3.name: The Saga of Gösta Berling

4.name: The Thief of Bagdad
4.description: A recalcitrant thief vies with a duplicitous Mongol ruler for the hand of a beautiful princess.

5.name: The Last Laugh
5.description: An aging doorman, after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious Hotel is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbours and society.

6.name: He Who Gets Slapped
6.description: A bitter clown endeavors to rescue the young woman he loves from the lecherous count who once betrayed him.

7.name: Die Nibelungen: Siegfried

9.name: The Hands of Orlac
9.description: A world-famous pianist loses both hands in an accident. When new hands are grafted on, he doesn't know they once belonged to a murderer.

10.name: The Iron Horse
10.description: After witnessing the murder of his father by a renegade as a boy, the grown-up Brandon helps to realize his father's dream of a transcontinental railway.

13.name: Peter Pan
13.description: Peter Pan enters the nursery of the Darling children and, with the help of fairy dust, leads them off to Never Never Land, where they meet the nefarious Captain Hook.

15.name: The City Without Jews
15.description: Jews are expelled from the city of Utopia.

16.name: The Navigator
16.description: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

18.name: Girl Shy
18.description: A shy, young man, who is completely incapable of talking to women, decides to write a book that details to other bachelors how to find a girlfriend.

22.name: Quo Vadis?
22.description: Watch the Apostles and other followers like Saul preach the gospel and spread the message of love and hope in this high quality entertaining animated feature for your kids and family.

23.name: Waxworks
23.description: A wax museum hires a writer to give the sculptures stories. The writer imagines himself and the museum owner's daughter in the stories.

27.name: Michael
27.description: Triangle story: painter, his young male model, unscrupulous princess.

28.name: The Red Lily
28.description: Two young lovers escape their past lives to Paris until fate separates them.

33.name: Secrets
33.description: After 40 years of struggle on the Wyoming frontier, a woman reflects on her hardscrabble life with her unfaithful husband.

41.name: America
41.description: The story of a family caught up in the American Revolutionary War.

43.name: The Sea Hawk
43.description: A wrongly convicted English gentleman goes from galley slave to pirate captain.

44.name: A Sainted Devil
44.description: A nobleman seeks to rescue his bride, who has been kidnapped by his former lover and a bandit.

48.name: White Shadows
48.description: In Paris a wild girl becomes possessed by the soul of her twin who died to save her life.

49.name: The Humming Bird
49.description: A pickpocket (Swanson) falls in love with a newspaperman. When he is sent off to war and she disguises herself as a boy, joins a gang and sets out to save him.
